INSTRUCTIONAL DESIGNER

SUMMARY

Dedicated, efficient, and versatile professional credited with combining project management and data analysis, and grant writing expertise to lead companies toward improved collaboration, organization, and productivity.
Proven track record of developing and implementing record-keeping and organizational systems that streamline operations.
Demonstrated ability to create and foster strong working relationships with colleagues and clients.
Strong communicator, with particular expertise in grant writing, new program implementation, and deadline adherence.
Highlights
Course Design  Project Management Verbal & Written Communication Payroll & Budget Management Data Collection and Reporting Grant Writing Hiring/On-Boarding & New Hire Orientation Event planning Cross-Functional Collaboration New Process Implementation Deadline Adherence

EXPERIENCE

Assist faculty in designing online, hybrid, and face-to-face courses.
Assist faculty in identifying, testing, and implementing innovative and new technologies.
Assist faculty in designing appropriate assessments mapped to course, program, or institutional objectives.
Assist faculty in in ensuring compliance with copyright, intellectual property, and accessibility.
Provide one-on-one faculty training and guidance on use of in-class and online technologies.
Attended workshops on learning goals, classroom management, student motivation and engaging learning activities.
Developed partnerships with industry and secondary education institutions.
Contributed to ongoing staff training sessions.

Facilitator in building successful partnerships with local community, industry and statewide organizations to assess skill and training requirements to fulfill community needs.
Coordinated the planning and preparation of grant proposals to include gathering required data and writing proposal.
Provided vision, direction and overall implementation of the grant to align with approved grant award.
Created and distributed all reporting to grant authority.
Coordinated additional continuing education programs as needed.

Escort for donor and courier for stem cell donation.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Civil Engineering Project Manager – Exciting Opportunity

Location: Detroit, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Civil Engineering Project Manager – Exciting Opportunity in Detroit, MI

Our client boasts a strong presence with licenses in over 20 states, translating to a diverse range of projects and exponential career growth opportunities. With six strategically located offices across the US, including five in the Detroit area, you will enjoy a short commute to work. Moreover, the chance to mentor and train fellow engineers on the team reinforces our commitment to cultivating talent and fostering professional development.

Benefits

– Expansive footprint across multiple states for varied work opportunities

– Convenient location with multiple offices in the Detroit area for easy accessibility

– Opportunity to mentor and train engineers, contributing to personal and professional growth

Responsibilities

– Collaborate with clients to analyze site requirements and provide detailed project information

– Lead project proposals and define project tasks, schedules, and resource needs

– Manage daily operations for civil engineering/site work design projects, ensuring efficiency and quality

Requirements

– Hold a Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering and possess or be eligible to obtain a Michigan P.E. License

– Demonstrate 5 years of project management experience, ideally in healthcare, residential, commercial, or industrial land development projects

– Showcase 10 years of relevant civil engineering expertise in site development, including design, permitting, and budgeting

Do you have any disability or condition that could affect you in the application and interview process? Please feel free to share this information as part of your application, including any necessary adjustments you might need, so we can help make the process easier for you. We assure you this information will not have any negative effect on the interview process outcome.

About NonStop: We are NonStop, a leading provider of staffing solutions throughout Europe and now also in the US. We’re passionate about connecting talent with opportunity and work non-stop to support our clients in hiring the best talent for their teams. Feel free to pop over to our website, NonStop Consulting, for more information, to browse all our roles, or to let us know how we can help you.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
